announcements.title: 91-Day Treasury Bill Auction - January 2024
announcements.summary: Bank of Ghana announces 91-day Treasury Bill auction with target amount of GHS 500 million
announcements.content: The Bank of Ghana invites bids for 91-day Treasury Bills with a target amount of GHS 500 million. Bidding opens on January 2, 2024 at 9:00 AM and closes on January 5, 2024 at 4:00 PM. Settlement will occur on January 8, 2024.

announcements.title: 182-Day Treasury Bill Auction Results
announcements.summary: Results for 182-day Treasury Bill auction - Total bids received: GHS 723 million
announcements.content: The Bank of Ghana announces results for the 182-day Treasury Bill auction conducted on January 12, 2024. Total bids received amounted to GHS 723 million from 89 bidders. The average yield was 29.1% with a margin rate of 28.8%.

announcements.title: 3-Year Government Bond Auction
announcements.summary: 3-Year Government Bond with coupon rate of 19.5% - Target amount GHS 1 billion
announcements.content: The Bank of Ghana announces a 3-Year Government Bond auction with a coupon rate of 19.5% per annum. The target amount is GHS 1 billion. Bidding closes on January 19, 2024 at 4:00 PM. Settlement date is January 22, 2024.

announcements.title: Monetary Policy Committee Decision - January 2024
announcements.summary: MPC maintains policy rate at 30.0% - Inflation outlook stable
announcements.content: The Monetary Policy Committee has decided to maintain the policy rate at 30.0%. The Committee noted that inflation pressures have eased and expects inflation to remain within the target band of 8Â±2 percent over the medium term.

announcements.title: 91-Day Treasury Bill Auction - Upcoming
announcements.summary: Upcoming 91-day Treasury Bill auction - Target amount GHS 600 million
announcements.content: The Bank of Ghana invites bids for 91-day Treasury Bills with a target amount of GHS 600 million. Bidding opens on January 23, 2024 at 9:00 AM and closes on January 26, 2024 at 4:00 PM. Settlement will occur on January 29, 2024.
